greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the n-th number m such that m^2 divides n^m - 1 (or 0 if m does not exist).
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if(n==2, 0, my(cnt=0, k=0); while(cnt<n, k++; if(Mod(n, k^2)^k==1, cnt++)); k)}
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 24 2020
